solution.text:
Diameter of the cone, d\(=_{j}_\,cm\Rightarrow\)Radius, r\(=_{{j/Decimal(2)}}_\,cm\)
Slant height of the cone, l\(=_{k}_\,cm\)
Height of cone, h\(=\sqrt{l^2-r^2}\)
\(=\sqrt{_{{k**2}}_-_{{(j/Decimal(2))**2}}_}=\sqrt{_{{(k**2)-(j/Decimal(2))**2}}_}=_{{trunc((((k**2)-(j/Decimal(2))**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_\,cm\)
Volume of the cone\(=\frac13 \pi r^2h\)
\(=\frac13 \pi \times _{{(j/Decimal(2))}}_^2 \times _{{trunc((((k**2)-(j/Decimal(2))**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_\)
\(=_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*(j/Decimal(2))**2*(trunc((((k**2)-(j/Decimal(2))**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3))),3)}}_\,cm^3\)
